volumeFraction.description: the ratio of the volume of the material to the total volume

saturationConcentration.description: the saturation concentration of the guest molecule in the host material

guestStoichiometry100.description: the ratio of the concentration of the guest molecule to the saturation concentration of the guest molecule in a phase at a cell voltage that is defined as 100% SOC

guestStoichiometry0.description: the ratio of the concentration of the guest molecule to the saturation concentration of the guest molecule in a phase at a cell voltage that is defined as 0% SOC
